lead_paragraph: The trucking company involved in a crash that killed 11 people in Kentucky on Friday was rated “deficient” by regulators, repeatedly failing inspections.
snippet: The trucking company involved in a crash that killed 11 people in Kentucky on Friday was rated “deficient” by regulators, repeatedly failing inspections.

headline.main: Kentucky: Trucking Firm in Crash Failed Inspections
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Trucking Firm In Crash Failed Inspections
